Our society has various problems. There are many oraganisation like orphanages,old age homes and blind schools etc in india that are ardently trying to solve these problem.Most of these these oraganizations are non-profit or charitable organizations that are dedicated to the welfare of the abandoned and destitute people in india. Saya introduces you the platform to get connected to such oraganisation so that you can also contribute to solve our societies problem...
	Features of the SAYA_1.0 are: 
 ● Free Registration 
 ● Serach for the social organization present in nearby area and get location and information about it.
 ● Want to help via: Clothes and study materials.
 ● Send and Get back the reply for the help provided by Helper.
 The Social Awareness in Youngsters App help towards humanity and also it provides a platform for youngsters who are willing to help such a oraganisations .Their little bit contributions will provide a better life to many orphans
